Text: This is the Halloween edition. I thought it was the original when i downloaded it. I will upload the original soon. Sorry for the not seeding. This torrent is not dead, if you can't download just leave it open and i will continue to seed as much as possible.

Please tell me - Is this an ISO-file, just to burn and play in the old Xbox?
It was not an ISO-file, who do I burn it?

this is just the files. you can either ftp them to your xbox's hard drive, or you can download a program called c-xbox tool and use it to create an xbox iso of the unzipped directory. just make sure that the default.xbe is in the root directory of the iso.
